flawed_nl_solution:
After buying 3 pieces of gum Ariana has 10 + 3 = <<10+3=18>>18 pieces of gum.
After giving her 11 friends gum Ariana has 18 - 11 = <<18-11=7>>7 pieces of gum left.
#### 7

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 13, not 18. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
